subjects.contents:
Some assignments
 type|Has reference type 
 author|Has author 
 authors|Has author 
 title|Has title 
 journal|Has publisher 
 abstract|Has abstract

subjects.name: Example/12/1
subjects.contents:
{{#scite:
 |bibtex=@ARTICLE{Meyer2000,

TITLE="A constraint-based framework for diagrammatic reasoning",

VOLUME= "14",
ISSUE = "4",
PAGES= "327--344",
YEAR=2000
}
 |citation text=2000}}

propertyValues: A constraint-based framework for diagrammatic reasoning
